thread.title: Is this Robert and Aaron's first kiss as husbands in Emmerdale? | Metro News
thread.title_full: Is this Robert and Aaron's first kiss as husbands in Emmerdale? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Is this Robert and Aaron's first kiss as husbands in Emmerdale? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Sunday 19 Feb 2017 6:59 am (Picture: ITV) 
This is your first look at a romantic scene in the second of the two wedding episodes which revolve around Aaron Dingle and Robert Sugden’s bid to become husbands ahead of Aaron’s sentencing in Emmerdale. But is this their first kiss as a married couple or has the arrival of the police ruined their big day? 
Fans will already know that the police will burst into the ceremony that Robert, Liv and the Dingles have painstakingly put together at the last minute as a surprise for Aaron. But who they are there for and whether it will stop the wedding is a closely guarded secret. 
In the run up to the big moment, Robert is desperate to ensure that the surprise isn’t ruined for Aaron. As Liv leads the decoration of the Woolpack, Robert and Chas enlist Cain’s help in preventing Aaron walking in early and blowing the whole thing. (Picture: ITV) 
So, of course, he ends up in the boot of a car. What else? 
As Robert lifts the lid of the vehicle and invites the man he loves to marry him on that very day, Aaron is stunned but soon overjoyed. (Picture: ITV) 
But as Harriet kicks off the ceremony, chaos unfolds with the arrival of officers. 
What happens next will unfold only on screen but a sneak preview from the following episode shows Robron sharing a tender and loving kiss. The question is – is it their first kiss as husbands? 
One to watch: Tuesday 21st February at 7pm on ITV. All the press event gossip! 
In case you missed any, here are links to all of the articles from the Emmerdale press event. 
First details of Chas’ exit revealed
